Actions.Name: Sea Legs
Actions.Description: Shove all adjacent characters 1 space in the same direction.

Actions.Name: Plunder
Actions.Description: The [name] dashes 1, then deals 2 damage and shoves an adjacent foe 1.

Actions.Name: Send to Erenhelion
Actions.Description: The [name] winds up for a massive blow. An adjacent foe must save or take 3[D]+[fray] and become slashed, or just [D]+[fray] on a successful save.
Actions.Effects: The [name] sacrifices 25% of their maximum hp after this ability resolves.
